text: The House of Representatives of the Philippines, the lower house of the Congress of the Philippines, has 235 single-member congressional districts (). They elect 235 of the 316 members of the House of Representatives. ==List== District Region Electorate Population Area (km2) Representative Party Abra's at-large CAR 250,985 Menchie Bernos Nacionalista Agusan del Norte's 1st XIII 403,150 Jose Aquino II Lakas Agusan del Norte's 2nd XIII 357,263 Dale Corvera PDP–Laban Agusan del Sur's 1st XIII 366,004 Alfel Bascug NUP Agusan del Sur's 2nd XIII 373,363 Eddiebong Plaza NUP Aklan's 1st VI 313,775 Carlito Marquez NPC Aklan's 2nd VI 301,700 Teodorico Haresco Jr. Nacionalista Albay's 1st V 395,907 Edcel Lagman Liberal Albay's 2nd V 477,781 Joey Salceda Lakas Albay's 3rd V 501,080 Fernando Cabredo NUP Antipolo's 1st IV-A 379,568 Roberto Puno NUP Antipolo's 2nd IV-A 507,831 Romeo Acop NUP Antique's at-large VI 612,974 Antonio Agapito Legarda Jr. NPC Apayao's at-large CAR 124,366 Eleanor Bulut Begtang NPC Aurora's at-large III 235,750 Rommel T.
